choices: DW hands you a glass of water
1.content:
“Ok kids, we’re leaving now” says your mom as she and dad are about to leave the house

“Ok now remember, we will be back in a couple of months, our numbers are on the fridge if you need anything and there’s money in the jar on the table for lunch and dinner” she turns to face your sister DW and says “and remember DW Arthur is in charge so what he says goes, understand” she nods as they walk out the door

Later on you are watching tv when DW comes out and says “I’m bored, will play with me Arthur” you look at her and say “what do you want to play” she looks at you with puppy dog eyes and says “I wanna play house” you look away in disgust and say “ew, that sounds so babyish, I’m not playing that”

DW starts to walk away when suddenly
1.title: Your parents leave

11.content: you suddenly hear a noise and suddenly get a strange feeling in your body and pass out you wake up
11.title: DW shrinks you

112.content:
As you open your eyes you look around and see that you’re in Kate’s room, you notice that everything seems a lot bigger than it normally is and you realise that you’ve been shrunken to the size of one of DW’s baby dolls. You look down and see that you’re wearing nothing apart from a bright pink diaper

Suddenly the door swings open and DW walks in “DW, what do you think you’re doing, put me back to normal right now or else I’ll-“ you try to say before DW shoves a pacifier into your mouth “no talking, you’re a baby” you spit out the pacifier and yell “I’M NOT A BABY, I’M YOUR BIG BROTHER, NOW PUT ME BACK TO NORMAL IMMEDIATELY.

DW picks you up and jams the pacifier back in your mouth and says “now you listen to me and you listen good, when you were passed out I took some incredibly adorable and for you, very embarrassing pictures of you, now if you don’t want those pictures to be spread around the entire school, I suggest that you do everything I say, nod if you understand

You nod as DW lays you down on Kate’s changing table and says “now lie still little man, it’s time to get you dressed” DW leave and comes back holding
112.title: In Kate’s crib

choices: Time to give baby a bath
1122.content:
DW renters holding a puffy bright pink dress that she forces onto you with ease, followed by matching pink mittens and booties, a pink bonnet and finally, a bright pink bib that reads “mommy’s little princess”

DW picks you up and says
1122.title: Pretty princess clothes

11221.content: What does she want to play
11221.title: Time for play time

112213.content:
You look confused as she carries you down to the lounge room and sits you down next her “I can tell you’re confused so I’ll explain this to you, I have a very special game I will be playing with you, but first you have to play 3 special mini games in order to prove yourself, understand”, you nod your head as DW picks you up and carries you back to Kate’s room

As she sets you down on the floor DW says “ok baby, the first game is called
112213.title: “The baby trials”

1122131.content:
You watch as your sister pulls out a roll of duct tape, just as you are about to ask her what’s going on, she picks you up, pins you against the wall and proceeds to use the tape, as she steps away it’s revealed that she has removed all of your clothes apart from your diaper and taped you to the wall by your wrists and ankles, your arms and legs are spread exposing your armpits and the underside of your legs.

DW leaves the room and returned with some kind of machine with about four robotic arms coming out of it “say hello to the tickle master 5000” says DW

“Ok baby Arthur, this game is super simple, this machine is going to tickle you for one minute, you can laugh all you want, but once you say uncle, you lose”

DW starts the machine as the arms move closer to you, one they start tickling you it’s unbearable, you can’t stop laughing.

A minute later
1122131.title: Tickle time

11221311.content:
“Well done baby, you won” says DW as she removes the tape and carries you Downstairs and straps you into Kate’s high chair. The chair is too small for you however, when your giant sister sits you down in the high chair your arms get pinned to your sides, also when DW attaches the tray to the chair it presses against your stomach, effectively trapping you in the chair.

DW walks away and returns with two metal plates covered by domes and puts them on the high chair, “ok baby, under each of these domes are four large jars of baby food, you will pick a dome and eat whatever is under the dome of your choice, now one dome may have better food than the other dome, but you don’t know what food is under what dome until you make your choice. So baby, what do you choose”

You give it some thought and choose
11221311.title: You don’t say uncle

112213112.content:
You pick the right dome as DW puts it on the table behind her next to a large bowl and a large wooden spoon, she turns around and says “now for a little bit of fun, let’s look at what you didn’t choose”

She removes the dome to reveal that
112213112.title: The right dome

1122131122.content:
As the dome is removed your face turns to defeat as you read the jars, Chocolate custard, Custard with banana, Apple & blueberry and last but not least Banana berries & yogurt

DW puts that tray away and removes the dome of the other tray, she’s blocking your view of the table and you can just sit there as she pours the mysterious contents of the jars into the bowl and starts mixing it all together.

After about 20 minutes of waiting she brings the bowl over and you get a look at the slop inside it, it’s chunky and brown, DW keeps stirring whilst saying “this yummy meal is a combination of Fish Pie with parsley, Beef Stew with spuds, liver & sardines and Strained beef liver“.

“Ok baby, for the first part of this game, all you have to do is eat every last bit of food in this bowl, after that you will proceed to part 2” she scoops up some of the chunky slop and slowly moves the spoon closer to your mouth “say ahhhh” you keep your mouth shut tight so she proceeds to hold your nose, forcing your mouth open, whilst she’s holding your nose with one hand, she starts shovelling spoonful after spoonful of the chunky slop into your mouth. Once the bowl is empty she removes her hand from your nose and cleans your face as you gasp for air.

“There there Arthur, that wasn’t so bad now was it, but there’s no time for a rest because now it’s time for
1122131122.title: You chose poorly

11221311221.content:
DW takes you out of the chair and carries you back upstairs, when she opens the door you and see a baby doll high chair strapped to a large disc on top of a motor, she sits you down in the chair and uses duct tape to restrain your wrists, ankles and chest to the chair, she steps back and pulls out a small remote.

“Now this is simple but hard at the same time, when I press this button, the motor will start and will spin you around and around for 60 seconds and the motor will spin faster every 15 seconds, all you need to do is not vomit”

DW starts the motor and the chair starts spinning, the faster it goes, the more upset your stomach gets, eventually the motor stops and DW can see that you have some vomit holding in your mouth, you try to fight it but eventually
11221311221.title: Feeding frenzy stage 2

112213112211.content:
Even though it tastes unbearable, it would’ve been better than puking, DW removes the tape and sits you down on the floor, “now you sit here and relax, I’m gonna get some things for the third game”

DW returns about 10 minutes later with a pair of noise canceling headphones and a 1 litre baby bottle filled with an unknown liquid, she sets them down and says “ok baby Arthur, the last game is called poopy prevention and all you need to do is see how long you can go without peeing or pooping in your diaper, but I’m not gonna make it easy for you

She suddenly grabs your nose and forces you,to drink the unknown liquid in the bottle, it tastes like nothing you have ever tasted before, just as she removes the bottle and lets go of you, she places the headphones on your head and hits play, you finally realise her plan when you hear a recording of her say “I hope baby Arthur enjoys my special bottle of poop inducer I made for him it’s a yummy mixture of baby formula, puréed baked beans, prune juice, extra strength laxatives and castor oil, I also hope he enjoys the sound of running water”

With the combination of the poop inducer in your stomach and the sound of running water in your ears it becomes almost impossible to hold it in, after nearly 5 minutes of fighting it you give in a release a stream of warm urine and mushy poop into your diaper

DW returns and says “oh my, someone made a big mess, anyway I think baby needs a nap so he will be refreshed and happy to play my special game tomorrow”.

“But first things first, I don’t think you’ve made enough of a mess yet baby” she suddenly puts 3 extra thick diapers on you and shoves another bottle of poop inducer (twice as big as the last one) into your mouth, after the bottle is finished she lays you down in Kate’s crib, kisses your forehead and says “goodnight baby, momma loves you” that bottle must’ve had some sleeping pills in it as well cause you pass out pretty quickly

Eventually
112213112211.title: You swallow it

1122131122111.content: “Baby Arthur, rise and shine” you slowly slowly open your eyes and see your sister looking down at you “good morning Arthur, you ready to have some fun” she stops, sniffs your diapers and says “oh my, baby Arthur, you’ve been brewing something real stinky in your tummy wummy, I guess it’s time to”
1122131122111.title: DW wakes you up

choices: Play “baby’s favourite song” crazy bus on repeat
Play a 24/7 marathon of “baby’s favourite show” Mary moo cow on the tv
11221311221112.content:
DW carries you downstairs and sits down on the couch and sets you down on her knee, “now baby needs something to watch or listen to so he can keep his mind off of all the warm mushy poop in his diapey wipey, and mommy knows exactly what to do”

DW proceeds to
11221311221112.title: Play bouncies

112213112211122.content:
You have zero idea what is worse right now, the sight and sound of being forced to watch the worst show to ever exist, Mary moo cow, or the feeling of warm mushy poop being spread around your diaper as DW bounces you up and down on her knee.

“Uh, DW, how much longer do-“ you attempt to say but DW straps a pacifier into your mouth and around your head, rubs your back softly and says “you don’t worry about a thing baby, just focus on watching Mary moo cow, I’ll let you know when bouncy time is over”.

After about 4-5 hours of being bounced on DW’s knee, having your diaper squeezed, having warm mushy poop spread all around your bottom and being forced to watch and listen to the word show to ever exist, DW turns off the tv, removes the pacifier and says “bouncy time is over, it’s changing time now”

DW carries you back to Kate’s room and lays you down on Kate’s changing table, removes your clothing and diaper, puts a fresh diaper on you and dresses you in
112213112211122.title: Play a 24/7 marathon of “baby’s favourite s...

choices: Make you Listen to baby’s favourite song” crazy bus on repeat
Make you Watch “baby’s favourite show” Mary moo cow
1122131122111223.content:
“Is baby ready to play a fun game, it starts with you putting on this brand new outfit”, you are unable to see it until DW puts you in front of a mirror, it’s a pink onesie That resembles a pig, complete with matching mittens and booties that look like pig hooves, a strap on pig nose that goes over your actual nose, a headband with 2 pig ears on it and a bib that reads “this litte piggy wants to eat”.

“Now whilst mommy prepares a couple more things for your special game, you need to be kept occupied”

DW proceeds to
1122131122111223.title: This little piggy set

11221311221112231.content:
“Mommy thinks that baby Arthur needs a bit of a break from Mary moo cow” says DW as she puts you into Kate’s jolly jumper.

She puts you in the jumper and your arms immediately get pinned to your sides and you are unable to move them, what’s worse is that the jumper is too high so your feet are dangling just off the ground. DW then proceeds to put a pair of noise canceling headphones on you and press play, you hear her say “if baby Arthur likes Mary moo cow, then I have no doubt that he’ll enjoy listening to crazy bus”. “ “NO, ANYTHING BUT CRAZY BUS, I HATE THAT-“ you attempt to scream at the top of your lungs, but your attempts are nullified when DW shoves a pacifier into your mouth and ties it around your head so you are unable to spit it out. After a couple of seconds of silence, your suffering begins.

As DW is walking away she turns to you and says “aww, baby Arthur loves listening to crazy bus, doesn’t he?” DW walks into the kitchen and leaves you to your suffering.

After what feels like an eternity of listening to that horrible song, DW walks in, removes the headphones, takes you out of the jumper and says “put on your yummy face baby Arthur, cause it’s time to feed this little piggy” whilst tickling your stomach and carrying you to the kitchen to begin playing
11221311221112231.title: “Baby’s favourite song” crazy bus on repeat

112213112211122311.content:
DW carries you over to Kate’s high chair and sets you down in it, she proceeds to restrain your wrists to the tray with duct tape, she leaves the room and comes back with a couple of things you’ve never seen before.

One was a wheel that you would see on reality TV game shows and the other is some kind of weird machine with a laptop on one side and the side facing the high chair has some kind of nozzle on it with a large spoon resting below it. She then proceeds to
112213112211122311.title: This little piggy

choices: You have to eat and succeed (4 feedings left)
You have to eat and failed (punishment time)
1122131122111223111.content:
"Okay baby Arthur, this game is super duper easy! All you have to do is be your cute little self and I'll spin this wheel." DW exclaimed as she revealed the wheel. It was covered in labels ranging from "Apple & Blueberry" to "Roast Lamb Dinner & Vegetables with a hint of rosemary". The other strange thing was four of the sections were just an image of a large pig trough filled with slop.

"I'm gonna spin the wheel of yummy treats and whatever it lands on I'll put a big glob of it on the spoon. Then whenever you get this trough picture, the spoon will force the yummy treat into your mouth. If you can eat five in a row without being a bad fussy piggy then mommy will give you a reward. But if piggy is bad, not only will you get a nasty mean punishment, but the counter for how many spoonfuls you have eaten will be reset to zero"

DW spins the wheel and it lands on Butternut Squash, Broccoli, Carrot & Chickpeas, as a unidentifiable glob of mush is dispensed onto the spoon, DW looks at the wheel and says “mmm, that sounds organic, and organic food sounds yummy in your tummy” DW spins the wheel and it lands on
1122131122111223111.title: Explain the rules

choices: You have to eat and succeed (4 feedings left)
You have to eat and failed (punishment time)
11221311221112231111.content: The wheel lands on Sweetcorn as a glob of orange yellow mush as the wheel is spun again and it lands on
11221311221112231111.title: Another ingredient is added

choices: puts you down for a nap
makes you watch a show meant for baby girls.
11223.content:
As you open your mouth to tell DW to put you back to normal she pushes a nozzle into it. You sputter a little as you feel milk enter your mouth giving you choice but drink it down. All the while your now larger five year old sister is rocking you back and forth as if trying tp get you to fall asleep in her arms.

I a surprisingly shorty time the bottle was drained as much to your embarrassment DW raises you to her shoulder and begins to pat your back as if to burp you. Which only got worse when you actually do burp.

"There we go all that bad air is out of you?" DW said as she...
11223.title: Time for baby’s baba

choices: Pull out a stereo and play “baby’s favourite song” crazy bus on repeat
Turn on the tv and play a marathon of “baby’s favourite show” Mary moo cow
112232.content:
“Baby needs something to occupy himself with whilst mommy makes his lunch” says DW as she sets you down on the couch, rushes back upstairs and returns with Kate’s Jolly jumper.

She puts you in the jumper and your arms immediately get pinned to your sides and you are unable to move them, what’s worse is that the jumper is too high so your feet are dangling just off the ground and DW has placed your head in some sort of circular head brace attached to the metal bars on the stand of the jumper, you are currently facing the television unable to move your hands or your head.

“Mommy knows exactly how to keep the baby occupied” she proceeds to
112232.title: makes you watch a show meant for babies

1122322.content:
“NO, ANYTHING BUT MARY MOO COW, I HATE THAT-“ you attempt to scream at the top of your lungs, but your attempts are nullified when DW shoves a pacifier into your mouth and ties it around your head so you are unable to spit it out. She turns on the tv and the marathon begins.

As DW is walking away she turns to you and says “aww, baby Arthur loves watching Mary moo cow, doesn’t he?” DW walks into the kitchen and leaves you to your suffering.

After what feels like an eternity of watching that horrible show, the tv suddenly turns off and can hear DW say to you from the kitchen “put on your yummy face baby Arthur, cause it’s feeding time”
1122322.title: A Mary moo cow marathon

choices: Time for more Mary moo cow
11223221.content:
DW returns with a large bowl filled with a horrid chunky mixture of green and brown slop and a large spoon,she sets the bowl and spoon on the table and says “oh I forgot something, I’ll be right back”.

She returns about 5 minutes later with a camcorder attached to a tripod, she sets it up facing you and hits record “say hi baby Arthur, say mommy’s gonna feed me, her homemade meat and vegetable, baby food surprise, for the first time today, and I think he’s gonna like it”.

DW scoops up some of the mush and moves the spoon towards your mouth “ here comes the yum yum train, right into the station, toot toot, yum yum express coming through, toot toot, next stop tummyland” says DW as she puts the food in your mouth, “good job Arthur, but we’re not done yet, there’s many more trips that the yum yum express needs to make to tummyland” says DW as she prepares another spoonful. This whole experience felt degrading, being forced to wear baby clothes, forced to drink from a baby bottle, forced to watch baby shows, but being forced to eat baby food fed to you by your little sister, let alone being filmed as well, that’s the absolute bottom of the barrel.

Eventually the bowl is empty and DW wipes your face and says “well done Arthur, you loved my meat and vegetable baby food surprise didn’t you”

DW looks at you and says
11223221.title: Time for baby’s lunch

112232212.content:
DW leaves for a minute and comes back with a one litre baby bottle of formula, she presses a button and a robotic arm comes out of the wall, grabs the bottle and forces you to drink all of it, once the bottle is empty, DW grabs it, makes the robotic arm go back into the wall, looks at you and says “now mommy needs to have her lunch so baby Arthur needs something to keep him occupied” DW removes your bib, clips the pacifier from before into your mouth, turns around and walks towards the kitchen, you can’t see her do this but she sticks her hand around the corner and turns on the tv and your worst nightmare appeared on screen, 24/7 Mary moo cow marathon.

As you suffer through this horrible show, you feel the need to poop really really badly, you try to fight it but to no avail, a stream of warm mushy poop overflows your diaper.

After another 2-3 hours of watching this horrible show, DW walks back in and turns off the tv. She removes you from the jumper and says “my god, baby Arthur really made a stinky mess in his diapey wipey, let momma
112232212.title: Time for baby’s baba & more Mary moo cow

1122322121.content:
“Let momma get you out of that stinky smelly poopy diaper and into a nice fresh clean one” says DW as she lays you down on Kate’s changing table and undresses you.

After cleaning your dirty butt and putting a clean diaper on you DW says “now that baby Arthur is all nice and clean, now we can play
1122322121.title: Change your diaper

choices: Don’t eat that, eat baby food
11223221212.content:
“Oh my, you don’t look so good baby, well don’t you worry, Doctor DW will take good care of you”

Your laying down on Kate’s changing table wearing nothing apart from your pacifier and diaper that was just put on you. DW walks over holding a case full of real doctor’s equipment, “ok first things first, let’s check your heart rate” DW presses the stethoscope against your chest and holds it there, it feels cold and uncomfortable, she puts the stethoscope away and picks you up, “you’re heart rate’s a little high but that’s nothing to worry about, now let’s weigh you” says sarah as she puts you down on a set of scales, after a couple of seconds of looking at the scales, she picks you up and carries you back to the table

“You’re a little underweight so we’re gonna have to feed you” you look at her shocked, “feed me, I don’t need to eat, you’ve already fed me 20 minutes ago” DW looks at you with a stern face and says “now if doctor DW says that her patient needs to eat, then her patient needs to eat and there’s not gonna be any ands ifs or buts about it” DW walks away and returns with a paddle pop stick and a small light “now let’s check inside that pretty little mouth of yours, say ahhh” as you open your mouth DW presses the paddle pop stick against your tongue and shines the light in your mouth for about a minute then removes both of them, before continuing she changes you into a fresh diaper.

“Ok baby you’re doing so well and we’re almost done” says DW as she places you on your stomach and pulls down your diaper, “only thing left is to check your temperature the old fashioned way” you look worried as she says while holding a rectal thermometer “now we can do this the easy way or the hard way”

You try to crawl away but she puts the full force of her palm on your back stopping you, “we’re doing this the hard way then” says DW as she slowly inserts the thermometer into your rectum, as you squirm around all DW does is rub your back softly and say “there there baby, it’ll all be over soon, everything will be ok” after a couple of minutes she removes the thermometer, pulls your diaper back up and sits you up.

“Ok, your temperature is higher than normal so doctor DW needs to get you some special medicine”, DW comes back 5 minutes later with a large spoon and a bottle of castor oil, as she pours a lot of it onto the spoon and walks towards you she says “you are a sick baby, so now you have to take, castor oil, now open wide, say ahhhh” you reluctantly swallow the oil, you want to spit it out but DW covers your mouth forcing you to swallow it

DW sees you pick up a cracker that was left on Kate’s changing table and she suddenly slaps it out of your hands, picks you up and says
11223221212.title: Doctor and patient

112232212121.content:
“Ah ah ahhh” says DW as she picks you up and carries you downstairs “that was bad baby, you don’t eat that food anymore, I eat normal food, you eat baby food. Speaking of which, doctor DW says that baby Arthur is a little underweight, so let’s go fill that tummy wummy with some nummy nummies”.

DW sets you back into Kate’s high chair and straps you in, she leans in real close and whispers into your ear “you’re gonna eat every last bit of food or not only will I put 5-10 diapers on you, force you to drink 3 large baby bottles of poop inducer and not change you for 24 hours, you also won’t get the very special surprise I made just for you, understand” you nod as she walks away and pulls out the bowl and spoon from before and 8 jars of food, she mixes them all together and brings the bowl over to you, it’s essentially a large bowl of unidentifiable chunky slop.

“You’re gonna love this meal Arthur, it’s a yummy nummy mixture of:

Overnight Oats with Apple & Cinnamon
Strawberry, Banana & Coconut Milk
Carrot Chickpeas Zucchini Pear
pumpkin & spinach pasta bake
Alphabet pasta, tomato & beef
Mixed vegetables
Strained beef liver
Pear, Pea & Spinach

As DW ties a bib around your neck that reads “feed me till I want no more”, she announces
112232212121.title: Don’t eat that, eat baby food

1122322121211.content: “Baby feeding time, time for baby food” she shoves the spoon into your mouth, it tastes ville so you spit it out, DW gives you a disappointing look, “what did I say Arthur? I said you’re gonna eat every last bit of food, now since you have been a good boy prior to now, I’ll give you one last chance” she scoops up some more mush “now hear comes the airplane *makes airplane noises* open up the hanger baby Arthur” you swallow spoonful after spoonful and eventually
1122322121211.title: Feeding time

choices: A green veggie smoothie in a large baby bottle
11223221212111.content: Despite the chunky texture and vile taste you managed to finish the entire bowl as DW moves the bowl and says “well done baby, now you can get your reward” she walks over to the kitchen bench and returns with a plate covered by a metal dome, she removes the the dome to reveal
11223221212111.title: You finish it all

choices: Put you down for a nap before din dins
112232212121112.content:
On the plate in front of you, you see a mudpie as big as your head with at least 3 worms sticking out of it, DW looks at you and says “now eat your mudpie and I’ll change your diaper”.

You turn your head as DW picks up a spoon and says “aww, is baby Arthur having trouble with his mudpie, here, let momma help”.

DW scoops up the entire mudpie in one spoonful and slowly moves it towards your mouth “come baby Arthur, open up for the Choo Choo train, Choo Choo, open up the tunnel” you open up as she shoves the entire mudpie into your mouth and presses your cheeks together forcing you to swallow, as she cleans your face and removes you from the high chair she says “time for mommy to
112232212121112.title: A large mudpie

13.content:
DW taps you on the shoulder, you turn to face her and she says “you looked thirsty” “uh, thanks, I guess” you say as you reluctantly take the glass from her and begin drinking.

After 5 minutes you start to feel drowsy and lie down, just before you pass out though, you see DW look at you and say “aww, the poor baby is sleepy, let mama help you” that’s the moment when you realise, the water has been drugged with sleeping pills

You wake up
13.title: DW hands you a glass of water

choices: A stereo, a spoon and 8 bowls with labels on them
133.content:
You slowly start to wake up, you try to move your arms but you are unable to, you can see your reflection in the mirror, you are wearing some kind of baby girl clothing, your wrists, ankles and chest are restrained to Kate’s high chair.

Suddenly DW walks in and you attempt to scream at her but she shoves a pacifier into your mouth and says “no talking, you’re a baby, now sit still young man, it’s time to feed the baby”

DW ties a bib around your neck, looks at you and says “now I’m gonna remove your pacifier, now if you misbehave, there will be punishment, nod if you understand me” you nod as DW removes your pacifier, leaves the room and returns with
133.title: In Kate’s high chair

1332.content:
You’re confused at first when you see the stereo, but once you see the 8 bowls you finally realise what’s going on, the vegetable song, it was a song that your mom would sing to Kate to get her to eat her veggies, every night at dinner they would sing the song and it drove you crazy but DW never seemed bothered by it.

DW looks at you sternly and says “you’ve heard the song enough times so you definitely know all the lyrics” you nod because that fact is unfortunately true “so don’t even try and pretend to not know the words or else I’ll know, got it” you nod as she brings over the first bowl labeled
1332.title: A stereo, a spoon and 8 bowls with labels on them

DW: Peas, peas, it's time to eat your peas!

Arthur: Yes, yes, yes, I want to eat my peas!

DW: Good, good! The peas are good for you!

Arthur: Yay, yay, yay, I love them, oooh!

DW: See, see, Arthur likes the peas!

DW: One, two, three! He ate them up, you see!

Arthur: Ha! Ha! Ha! The peas are all gone now!

Arthur: Yum, yum, yum, I like them, wow!

13321.title: Peas

The song resumes as DW feeds you yet another bowl of green mush and you both resume singing

DW: Broccoli, broccoli, it's time to eat your broccoli!

Arthur: Yes, yes, yes, I want to eat my broccoli!

DW: Good, good! The broccoli’s good for you!

Arthur: Yay, yay, yay, I love them, oooh!

DW: See, see, Arthur likes the broccoli!

DW: One, two, three! He ate them up, you see!

Arthur: Ha! Ha! Ha! The broccoli’s all gone now!

Arthur: Yum, yum, yum, I like them, wow!

133211111.title: Broccoli

As the eighth and final instrumental part begins and the song plays to a close, DW cleans you up, carries you over to the couch, lays you down on her lap and says “well done baby, time for baba”, DW pulls out a large baby bottle and shoves it into your mouth, you notice that the bottle is filled with
133211111111.title: Spinach

1332111111112.content:
DW sits down on the couch, reclines you slightly on her lap, cradles you in her arm and shoves a bottle in your mouth, you initially drink but when you see the bottle of castor oil on the table you try to push the bottle out of your mouth, in response, DW lays you completely flat on your back, shoves the bottle back into your mouth and hold your nose forcing you to drink, all the while she says to you “uh uh uh, baby Arthur needs to be a good boy and drink his castor oil so that he can be a good boy for mommy and make poopies”

Just as DW removes the bottle you feel something not right in your stomach and without warning, a giant load of warm mushy poop fills your diaper as DW plugs her nose and says “pee yew baby Arthur, you really need a change, but then again, it does seem like a perfect time to play a special game

What happens
1332111111112.title: Castor oil

choices: Arthur hypnotised to think he is the younger sibling
DW. uses growth ray on herself
15.content: How about DW doing one of these to Arthur (you? What about DW hypnotising you so that you think you are the younger sibling. Or maybe she uses a growth ray to make herself bigger. Maybe changes their ages
15.title: Something else

155.content:
How about this. DW creates a device that alter's the way people see her and Arthur(you) making everyone think that Arthur is DW's little brother.

Or maybe DW uses a device that alters reality. DW could make it so that younger siblings babysit their older siblings(as one example)
155.title: other choices

info.brief_description: Arthur is supposed to babysit his sister D.W but things don’t go as planned
info.description:
Arthur is told by his parents to babysit his sister D.W whilst they’re out of town with his baby sister, what could go wrong

Characters:

Arthur read: age 14

D.W. Read: age 5

Kate read: age 6 months (she isn’t in the story but her room is used)

Note: in this story DW is super smart, a brilliant inventor and loves playing with baby dolls, Kate is younger than she is in the actual show and books & Arthur is older than he is in the actual show and books

Rules:

no sex

No death

Story is told from Arthur’s POV

Only character interactions are between Arthur and DW (may change later)

Edit: I’ve just started a new story today and as of now it only has 1 chapter, feel free to add if you wish
https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2238654-Tiny-toon-adventu...
